entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
